select.name: SelectAssetsAddId1
select.defineSQL: select tblFixedAssetAdd.id f1, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsNumber f2, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsName f3, tblFixedAssetAdd.GoodsSpec f4, tblDepartment.DeptFullName f5, tblFixedAssetAdd.StockCode f6, tblFixedAssetAdd.BillDate f7, tblFixedAssetType.TypeName f8, tblFixedAssetAccType.TypeName f9 from tblFixedAssetAdd left join tblFixedAssetType on tblFixedAssetType.id=tblFixedAssetAdd.AssetsType left join tblFixedAssetAccType on tblFixedAssetAccType.id=tblFixedAssetAdd.AssetsAccType left join tblDepartment on tblDepartment.classCode=tblFixedAssetAdd.DepartmentCode
select.changeCond: (tblFixedAssetAdd.statusId='0' and tblFixedAssetAdd.id not in (select AssetsAddId from tblFixedAssetClean WHERE workFlowNodeName='finish') and (tblFixedAssetAdd.id in (select AssetsAddId from tblFixedAssetDepreciate where tblFixedAssetDepreciate.Period=@Sess:NowPeriod and tblFixedAssetDepreciate.PeriodYear=@Sess:NowYear and tblFixedAssetDepreciate.statusId=1) or len(isnull(tblFixedAssetAdd.referDeprecia,''))!=0))
